name: deimosrising
text: Can you imagine the carnage that might be wrought if the power of Billy Idol were used for evil?

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by smaconi, fakead, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, dizneedave, relaxing, estutius, sonicscream2, nutmeg, M-E-Charm, Tipist)

name: professoryes
text: Ooho. Dangerous questions take us down dangerous paths, dear fellow.

name: bazookaradio
text: YES!

name: satellitetv
text: A comment left by satellitetv was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pokypig, KaMeT, sonicscream2, M-E-Charm)

name: ssddr
text: Since its Lie Bot giving us the information, its never clear if something supernatual did happen, or if philippe just belived it so hard that he heard things.

name: phthoggos
text: both, obviously.

name: cicadalek
text: He believed it so hard it became real

name: coldfrog
text: The power of belief gives you wicked sack.

name: tekende
text: The power of belief is what keeps airplanes in flight.

name: boredom_man
text: Also I have to stay amazingly drunk during the flight, or the plane will crash.

name: endoftheworld
text: Sometimes Lie Bot tells the truth. Even his name is a lie.

name: zem
text: this rabbit hole goes deeper than i ever imagined

name: wonelove
text: is so Lie Bot

name: dj
text: Are those little motion lines extending from his knee in panel 3 as the spirit of Billy Idol shifts him into a classical contrapost stance?  Oh man.

name: appers
text: Oh man hella chubbies for the Classics reference on the week before my exam! dj, if I pass because of you, man, I owe you a beer.

name: mega_panda
text: I think it's his pants growing leather

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Actually, compare the package in Panels 1 and 2 to Panels 3 and 4. It grew two sizes that day.

Although I don't want to imagine Philippe in those terms, so I'll just assume that the spirit of Billy Idol gifted him with a foil-wrapped cucumber.

name: stuart
text:
There aren't enough non-11 Spinal Tap references these days (Matthew Mead's programming examples are one subtle example, for both you covert DigiPen nerds reading Assetbar).

You, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar.

name: tetrisattack
text: Best...Story Arch...Ever...

name: gussiejives
text: A comment left by gussiejives was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, GeyserShitdick, estutius, nutmeg, slalvation)

name: jezebel
text: Actually, Billy Idol has talentS.

name: blastradius
text: Billy is the Google of faux-punk rock.

name: shoinan
text: Thanks to this strip, we can finally confirm that Phillipe has an ass.

name: iandorrinson
text:
R.A.D. C.H.I.L.L.I.E.S.

GOD i love this alt text

name: tekende
text: Onstad just really didn't want to let go of that phrase, did he? (See yesterday's alt text and the alternate version of the previous strip.)

name: slickshoes3234
text: Phillippe has no way of getting Eddie Money, ever.

name: ham_shoes
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: charchar
text: Ghosts are the new Rogaine.

name: undyingsong
text: Oh, hee hee!

name: vweep
text: Who the HELL is Billy Idol!?

name: mikeronomicon
text: I don't think Philipe has an ass. I think that was part of his Billy Idol powers. Gotta have an ass to rock the leather britches.

name: mattylite
text:
ROBOT ASS!!!!!

...uh, wait, no. Sorry. That doesn't apply here. Itchy trigger finger. Sorry.

name: acefalco
text: For some reason, the first time I read this, I thought it was Billy Joel, and Philippe's hair just didn't make any danged sense.

name: acefalco
text: I feel very dumb. Can someone please tell me how to remove that picture of the breasts and use my preferred picture?

name: heccibiggs
text: Fun fact: my team leader at work is Billy Idol's godmother. No word of a lie.

name: greenkoolayd
text: small world, indeed!  also, she must be older than dirt.  dude is like, in his late 50s, at least.

name: weretrout
text: Did LieBot just tell the truth?
